name: @tupaia/export-chart-lambda
description: Lambda Function for Tupaia Chart Export
author: Beyond Essential Systems <admin@tupaia.org> (https://beyondessential.com.au)

scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist --source-maps
scripts.package: rm -f package.zip && yarn babel && cp -r package.json dist && cd dist && yarn --production && zip -rq ../package.zip . && cd .. && rm -rf dist
